description: Visualise Erlang VM memory utilisation from erts_alloc perspective

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rabbitmq_identity_info" WITH key = "rabbitmq_cluster"
